Advance Unit Okayti:
No, no, that's not what I meant.
The Pontus Stone is so essential to suppress Fafurion that only the leader of the punitive force can keep the stone temporarily.
To suppress Fafurion, we should first get rid of Chief Gatekeeper Cyrax. Cyrax is guarding the temple right before the Heart of Tsunami that leads to Fafurion's Nest. Gather your men and take out Cyrax.
